verbose_text: To validate these stimuli as noxious versus innocuous, we first examined the sensory neuron populations that were activated by these four stimuli with in vivo calcium imaging in a mouse line, whereby Ca 2+ transients were recorded from ~ 1,500 DRG neurons per trial with the genetically encoded calcium indicator GCAMP6 driven by the Pirt promoter (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY).
evidence: calcium indicator GCAMP6 driven by the Pirt
